ygData.subject: Very Interesting place
ygData.msgSnippet: for a certain thing we will find it. The website is a Paranormal site , not in the sense of ghosties and ghoulies , but in the sense of just providing
ygData.messageBody:
for a certain thing we will find it. The website is a Paranormal
site , not in the sense of ghosties and ghoulies , but in the sense
of just providing information , interactivity and a little bit of
humour as well , but mainly this group is all about helping each
other , feeling down then there will always be someone to talk to.
It is not a yahoo or any other of the main groups it is a website.
At the moment they have spells , hypnosis machines ( to help stop
smoking , lose weight Etc ) ,info on most subjects it is truly a
remarkable place.
If you go and like what you see and want to become a part of it email
this address ... afhassassin@... , not the prettiest of
addresses but ~AFH~ stands for Assassins for Hire , that is what the
group started as in a free online multiplayer fantasy medieval RPG .
the protected the solo players against attacks from groups of other
players anyway the site is here .. http://afh.vze.com

there is also a page on wiccan traditions , and very important dates
in the history of witchcraft.
Thank you very much for reading this.
Yake care.
